= 编码 =

== 编码 ==

[[http://www.cnblogs.com/huxi/archive/2010/12/05/1897271.html|Python字符编码详解]]

unicode -> encode("utf-8") -> utf-8

utf-8 -> decode("utf-8") -> unicode

== 字符串 ==
str和unicode均是basestring的子类
=== str ===
默认使用utf-8编码后的字节串

通常一个中文被编码为3个字节，所以`len("中")==3`

=== unicode ===
`len(u"中")==1`
